title: 438: No Such Thing As A Candyfloss Blimp
content:
Dan, Anna, Andrew and special guest Malcolm Gladwell discuss Silicon Valley regrets, aeroplanes dangling from hooks and whether Dan should be a billionaire.

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
